backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types for users, products, orders, education content, business data, and integrations, plus comparison utilities for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for navigation updates and privacy policy link, mapping related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including routes, components, dashboards, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point defining metadata, icons, PWA settings, and root mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app name, theme, icons, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes, pages, authentication flow, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Admin tool for managing assistant knowledge base entries, allowing creation, editing, activation toggling, and deletion.
Displays unanswered assistant queries and allows admins to convert them into knowledge entries or mark them as answered.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Provides an admin interface for viewing users, filtering, and assigning system and access roles through dialog-driven updates.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Implements the assistant chat interface handling message exchange, API queries, typing state, and escalation prompts.
Floating widget that toggles the assistant chat panel open or closed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout providing header navigation with role-based dropdowns, mobile menu, user controls, cookie banner, and assistant widget.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Shows a cookie consent banner letting users accept or reject cookies and navigate to the privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile setup form that saves a user's full name and email using a mutation hook and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: A dialog with a checkbox and simple math challenge to verify the user is human before continuing an action.
frontend/src/components/startup/Activiti: Displays a list of startup activities, tracks completion progress, and allows marking tasks as complete.
frontend/src/components/startup/Business: Shows business credit progress and lets users update verification and credit bureau registration statuses.
frontend/src/components/startup/ClassesL: Lists user lessons with progress tracking and allows navigating into a selected lesson's details.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Displays full lesson details including video, HTML content, and controls for completion and navigation.
frontend/src/components/startup/VirtualM: Shows upcoming and past virtual meetings with join links and scheduling info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Provides a React Query mutation that calls actor.askAssistant with a question and category.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage authentication state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple placeholder React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, and other backend calls, many not yet implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, light/dark themes, and utility component styles including gradients and animations.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Manages cookie consent state using localStorage with helpers to get, set, and determine if consent should be shown.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Handles a TTL-based human verification flag stored in sessionStorage with functions to get, set, and clear the status.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Contains structured pricing model text and Store Builder pricing details for display across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks admin status, configures Stripe settings, and provides access to various admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Renders an affiliate dashboard with placeholder referral and commission data and alerts users if backend integration or authentication is missing.
frontend/src/pages/AppCenterPage.tsx: Provides UI for viewing, adding, editing, deleting, and converting webhook-based app integrations, gated by Internet Identity auth.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDashboard5: Displays a scheduling page with an embedded Calendly iframe and links for booking appointments with the ANC Apprentice Program Center.
frontend/src/pages/B2BDashboard.tsx: Shows a B2B dashboard with quick links and placeholder metrics, restricting access to authenticated users with a B2B membership role.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Lists customer-focused blog posts with metadata and navigation links to full post pages.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Renders full content for a selected customer blog post based on the route parameter, including metadata and multi-paragraph text.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Displays a customer FAQ page using accordion components and dynamic pricing text from PRICING_MODEL.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Provides UI for viewing and configuring a merchantâ€™s marketing funnel partner, with admin-only editing and URL validation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content and feature cards linking to store-related services.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Processes Stripe payment results, activates plans or subscriptions, and redirects users based on plan type.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI DSS compliance info with certificate preview, open-in-tab, and download actions.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a scrollable privacy policy page with sections outlining data collection and usage. Uses UI components to structure headings, paragraphs, and lists.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Displays a blog listing page showing multiple posts with categories, excerpts, and metadata. Includes navigation to individual blog posts.
Renders full blog post content based on the postId route param. Stores blog articles in a local record and displays metadata and text sections.
Provides an FAQ page with accordion items covering B2B services, startup features, integrations, payments, and support. Uses UI components for structured Q&A display.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Implements the Startup Program dashboard with membership checks, progress cards, and tabbed sections for lessons, meetings, activities, and credit building. Redirects or alerts users without proper access.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: React page for configuring store templates and branding, handling subscription checkout and saving store builder settings.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Product listing and checkout page with human verification gating, allowing authenticated users to buy items.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Central TypeScript type definitions for users, products, orders, store templates, customization, and integrations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, containers, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for ANC Marketplace.
